title: Jordy Smith Talks Neff
description:
http://www.neffheadwear.com/surf

South African surfer, Jordy Smith, discusses growing up surfing and how he joined the Neff team. Jordy grew up on the coast in Durban, South Africa. He got into surfing at a young age because he loved going down to the beach everyday and hanging out with his friends. Before long, Jordy was ripping with the best of them. He got started with Neff Headwear when he met the company's CEO, Shaun Neff. Jordy was stoked on the freedom Neff gave him to design his own hat, and the designs of Neff's clothing. Check Neff surfer Jordy Smith rip on the ASP World Tour.
